decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawing titles: 124PA05D PROPOSED SITE PLAN 08.10.21, 124PA06D PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN 05.10.21, 124PA07C PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN 05.10.21, 124PA08C PROPOSED ELEVATIONS 05.10.21 and 124PA09  PROPOSED SECTION 08.10.21
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and the Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 (g) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012), policies D1 and D3 of the London Plan 2021 and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - Section 12 Achieving well-designed places
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
| No windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the flank walls of the approved development.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12, London Plan 2021 policy D3 and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013)
description: Part single, part two storey rear extension (following demolition of existing single storey rear addition and existing garage)
